titleStmt.title: Christ's valedictions: or sacred observations on the last words of our savior delivered on the crosse. By Jenkin Lloyd, minister of the gospel, and rector of Llandissil in Cardigan shire
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Jenkin, b. 1623 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D.M. for D. Pakeman at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
